full_summary:
================

### Title and Reference

**Title (English):** TBIPS Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP)
**Title (French):** SPICT Avis de Projet de Marché (APM)
**Reference Number:** PW-22-01017127

### Announcement Details

* **Publication Date:** December 13, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date:** January 10, 2023, 2:00 PM EST
* **Solicitation Number:** 2023-00605
* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFQ)

### Procurement Information

* **Procurement Category:** Service
* **Gategory of Goods and Services:** Informatics Professional Services
* **Trade Agreements:** The contract is subject to the following trade agreements:
  * Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
  * Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
  * Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
  * Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
  * Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
  * Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
  * World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
  * Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
  * Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
  * Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
  * Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Contracting and Delivery Information

* **Contracting Entity:** Canadian Food Inspection Agency
* **Address:** 1400 Merivale Road, Ottawa, ON K1A 0Y9, Canada
* **Regions of Opportunity:** Canada
* **Regions of Delivery:** National Capital Region (NCR)

### Contact Information

* **Contact Name:** Ashley Bennett
* **Contact Email:** [jbennett@canada.ca](mailto:jbennett@canada.ca)
* **Contact Address:**
  * 59 Camelot Drive, Ottawa, ON K1A 0Y9, CA

### Notice and Attachment

* **Notice URL:** None
